      s.async = true;
      s.src = urls[i];
      var x = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
      x.parentNode.insertBefore(s, x);
    }
  };

  } else {

  window.ShopifyAnalytics = window.ShopifyAnalytics || {};
  window.ShopifyAnalytics.meta = window.ShopifyAnalytics.meta || {};
  window.ShopifyAnalytics.meta.currency = 'INR';
  var meta = {"page":{"pageType":"home"}};
  for (var attr in meta) {
    window.ShopifyAnalytics.meta[attr] = meta[attr];

<script class="analytics">
  (function () {
    var customDocumentWrite = function(content) {
      var jquery = null;

      if (window.jQuery) {
        jquery = window.jQuery;
      } else if (window.Checkout && window.Checkout.$) {
        jquery = window.Checkout.$;
      }

      if (jquery) {
        jquery('body').append(content);
      }
    };

    var hasLoggedConversion = function(token) {
      if (token) {
        return document.cookie.indexOf('loggedConversion=' + token) !== -1;
      }
      return false;
    }

    var setCookieIfConversion = function(token) {
      if (token) {
        var twoMonthsFromNow = new Date(Date.now());
        twoMonthsFromNow.setMonth(twoMonthsFromNow.getMonth() + 2);

        document.cookie = 'loggedConversion=' + token + '; expires=' + twoMonthsFromNow;
      }
    }

    var trekkie = window.ShopifyAnalytics.lib = window.trekkie = window.trekkie || [];
    if (trekkie.integrations) {
      return;
    }
    trekkie.methods = [
      'identify',
      'page',
      'ready',
      'track',
      'trackForm',
      'trackLink'
    ];
    trekkie.factory = function(method) {
      return function() {
        var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
        args.unshift(method);
        trekkie.push(args);
        return trekkie;
      };
    };
    for (var i = 0; i < trekkie.methods.length; i++) {
      var key = trekkie.methods[i];
      trekkie[key] = trekkie.factory(key);
    }
    trekkie.load = function(config) {
      trekkie.config = config || {};
      trekkie.config.initialDocumentCookie = document.cookie;
      var first = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
      var script = document.createElement('script');
      script.type = 'text/javascript';
      script.onerror = function(e) {
        var scriptFallback = document.createElement('script');
        scriptFallback.type = 'text/javascript';
        scriptFallback.onerror = function(error) {
                var Monorail = {
      produce: function produce(monorailDomain, schemaId, payload) {
        var currentMs = new Date().getTime();
        var event = {
          schema_id: schemaId,
          payload: payload,
          metadata: {
            event_created_at_ms: currentMs,
            event_sent_at_ms: currentMs
          }
        };
        return Monorail.sendRequest("https://" + monorailDomain + "/v1/produce", JSON.stringify(event));
      },
      sendRequest: function sendRequest(endpointUrl, payload) {
        // Try the sendBeacon API
        if (window && window.navigator && typeof window.navigator.sendBeacon === 'function' && typeof window.Blob === 'function' && !Monorail.isIos12()) {
          var blobData = new window.Blob([payload], {
            type: 'text/plain'
          });

          if (window.navigator.sendBeacon(endpointUrl, blobData)) {
            return true;
          } // sendBeacon was not successful

        } // XHR beacon

        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

        try {
          xhr.open('POST', endpointUrl);
          xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'text/plain');
          xhr.send(payload);
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }

        return false;
      },
      isIos12: function isIos12() {
        return window.navigator.userAgent.lastIndexOf('iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 12_') !== -1 || window.navigator.userAgent.lastIndexOf('iPad; CPU OS 12_') !== -1;
      }
    };
    Monorail.produce('monorail-edge.shopifysvc.com',
      'trekkie_storefront_load_errors/1.1',
      {shop_id: 62110924959,
      theme_id: 174102413471,
      app_name: "storefront",
      context_url: window.location.href,
      source_url: "//majnoonperfumery.in/cdn/s/trekkie.storefront.5a4f78eb26ea594ba1b5d72f179d68114c7cf8ca.min.js"});

        };
        scriptFallback.async = true;
        scriptFallback.src = '//majnoonperfumery.in/cdn/s/trekkie.storefront.5a4f78eb26ea594ba1b5d72f179d68114c7cf8ca.min.js';
        first.parentNode.insertBefore(scriptFallback, first);
      };
      script.async = true;
      script.src = '//majnoonperfumery.in/cdn/s/trekkie.storefront.5a4f78eb26ea594ba1b5d72f179d68114c7cf8ca.min.js';
      first.parentNode.insertBefore(script, first);
    };
    trekkie.load(
      {"Trekkie":{"appName":"storefront","development":false,"defaultAttributes":{"shopId":62110924959,"isMerchantRequest":null,"themeId":174102413471,"themeCityHash":"4350483422796846383","contentLanguage":"en","currency":"INR","eventMetadataId":"5d9c6f6f-5407-4b75-9ad8-34edbf22de09"},"isServerSideCookieWritingEnabled":true,"monorailRegion":"shop_domain"},"Session Attribution":{},"S2S":{"facebookCapiEnabled":true,"source":"trekkie-storefront-renderer","apiClientId":580111}}
    );

    var loaded = false;
    trekkie.ready(function() {
      if (loaded) return;
      loaded = true;

      window.ShopifyAnalytics.lib = window.trekkie;

      var originalDocumentWrite = document.write;
      document.write = customDocumentWrite;
      try { window.ShopifyAnalytics.merchantGoogleAnalytics.call(this); } catch(error) {};
      document.write = originalDocumentWrite;

      window.ShopifyAnalytics.lib.page(null,{"pageType":"home","shopifyEmitted":true});

      var match = window.location.pathname.match(/checkouts\/(.+)\/(thank_you|post_purchase)/)
      var token = match? match[1]: undefined;

        setCookieIfConversion(token);

      }
    });

                                  </button>
                                </quantity-input>
                              </div>
                              <cart-remove-button id="CartDrawer-Remove-1" data-index="1">
                                <button type="button" class="button button--tertiary cart-remove-button" aria-label="Remove Majnoon Marj By Maghribi - 8 ML" data-variant-id="44942228717727">
                                  <span class="svg-wrapper"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon icon-remove" viewBox="0 0 16 16"><path fill="currentColor" d="M14 3h-3.53a3.07 3.07 0 0 0-.6-1.65C9.44.82 8.8.5 8 .5s-1.44.32-1.87.85A3.06 3.06 0 0 0 5.53 3H2a.5.5 0 0 0 0 1h1.25v10c0 .28.22.5.5.5h8.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .5-.5V4H14a.5.5 0 0 0 0-1M6.91 1.98c.23-.29.58-.48 1.09-.48s.85.19 1.09.48c.2.24.3.6.36 1.02h-2.9c.05-.42.17-.78.36-1.02m4.84 11.52h-7.5V4h7.5z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M6.55 5.25a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v6a.5.5 0 0 0 1 0v-6a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5m2.9 0a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v6a.5.5 0 0 0 1 0v-6a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5"></path></svg>
</span>
                                </button>
                              </cart-remove-button>
                            </div><div id="CartDrawer-LineItemError-1" class="cart-item__error" role="alert">
                              <small class="cart-item__error-text"></small>
                              <span class="svg-wrapper"><svg class="icon icon-error" viewBox="0 0 13 13"><circle cx="6.5" cy="6.5" r="5.5" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="2"></circle><circle cx="6.5" cy="6.5" r="5.5" fill="#EB001B" stroke="#EB001B" stroke-width=".7"></circle><path fill="#fff" d="m5.874 3.528.1 4.044h1.053l.1-4.044zm.627 6.133c.38 0 .68-.288.68-.656s-.3-.656-.68-.656-.681.288-.681.656.3.656.68.656"></path><path fill="#fff" stroke="#EB001B" stroke-width=".7" d="M5.874 3.178h-.359l.01.359.1 4.044.008.341h1.736l.008-.341.1-4.044.01-.359H5.873Zm.627 6.833c.56 0 1.03-.432 1.03-1.006s-.47-1.006-1.03-1.006-1.031.432-1.031 1.006.47 1.006 1.03 1.006Z"></path></svg>
</span>
                            </div>
                          </quantity-popover>
                        </td>
                      </tr></tbody>
                </table>
              </div><p id="CartDrawer-LiveRegionText" class="visually-hidden" role="status"></p>

              Loading...
            </p>
          </div>
          <div id="CartDrawer-CartErrors" role="alert"></div>
        </form>
      </cart-drawer-items>

<h1 class="header__heading"><a href="/" class="header__heading-link link link--text focus-inset"><div class="header__heading-logo-wrapper">

                <img src="//majnoonperfumery.in/cdn/shop/files/MAJNOONLARGELOGOPNG.png?v=1713881229&amp;width=600" alt="majnoon perfumery" srcset="//majnoonperfumery.in/cdn/shop/files/MAJNOONLARGELOGOPNG.png?v=1713881229&amp;width=230 230w, //majnoonperfumery.in/cdn/shop/files/MAJNOONLARGELOGOPNG.png?v=1713881229&amp;width=345 345w, //majnoonperfumery.in/cdn/shop/files/MAJNOONLARGELOGOPNG.png?v=1713881229&amp;width=460 460w" width="230" height="77.77289836888332" loading="eager" class="header__heading-logo motion-reduce" sizes="(max-width: 460px) 50vw, 230px">
              </div></a></h1>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@6.8.4/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection() {
    let item = document.querySelector('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_7ngjQf');
    let perMobile = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile');
    let perMobileBig = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile-big');
    let perDesktop = item.getAttribute('data-preview-desktop');
    const slider = new Swiper('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_7ngjQf', {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      slidesPerView: 2,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-collection-btn-next-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_7ngjQf',
        prevEl: '.featured-collection-btn-prev-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_7ngjQf'
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.featured-collection-pagination-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_7ngjQf',
        type: 'progressbar'
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: perMobile,
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: perMobileBig,
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: perDesktop,
        }
      }
    })
  }
  initFeaturedCollection();
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:select', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:deselect', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:inspector:activate', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:settings:change', initFeaturedCollection);
  }

</script>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@6.8.4/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection() {
    let item = document.querySelector('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_RHTt8V');
    let perMobile = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile');
    let perMobileBig = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile-big');
    let perDesktop = item.getAttribute('data-preview-desktop');
    const slider = new Swiper('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_RHTt8V', {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      slidesPerView: 2,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-collection-btn-next-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_RHTt8V',
        prevEl: '.featured-collection-btn-prev-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_RHTt8V'
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.featured-collection-pagination-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_RHTt8V',
        type: 'progressbar'
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: perMobile,
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: perMobileBig,
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: perDesktop,
        }
      }
    })
  }
  initFeaturedCollection();
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:select', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:deselect', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:inspector:activate', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:settings:change', initFeaturedCollection);
  }

</script>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@6.8.4/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection() {
    let item = document.querySelector('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_xCAXgL');
    let perMobile = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile');
    let perMobileBig = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile-big');
    let perDesktop = item.getAttribute('data-preview-desktop');
    const slider = new Swiper('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_xCAXgL', {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      slidesPerView: 2,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-collection-btn-next-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_xCAXgL',
        prevEl: '.featured-collection-btn-prev-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_xCAXgL'
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.featured-collection-pagination-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_xCAXgL',
        type: 'progressbar'
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: perMobile,
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: perMobileBig,
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: perDesktop,
        }
      }
    })
  }
  initFeaturedCollection();
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:select', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:deselect', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:inspector:activate', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:settings:change', initFeaturedCollection);
  }

</script>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@6.8.4/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection() {
    let item = document.querySelector('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_Bfz8yx');
    let perMobile = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile');
    let perMobileBig = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile-big');
    let perDesktop = item.getAttribute('data-preview-desktop');
    const slider = new Swiper('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_Bfz8yx', {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      slidesPerView: 2,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-collection-btn-next-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_Bfz8yx',
        prevEl: '.featured-collection-btn-prev-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_Bfz8yx'
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.featured-collection-pagination-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_Bfz8yx',
        type: 'progressbar'
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: perMobile,
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: perMobileBig,
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: perDesktop,
        }
      }
    })
  }
  initFeaturedCollection();
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:select', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:deselect', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:inspector:activate', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:settings:change', initFeaturedCollection);
  }

</script>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@6.8.4/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection() {
    let item = document.querySelector('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_D8mh9p');
    let perMobile = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile');
    let perMobileBig = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile-big');
    let perDesktop = item.getAttribute('data-preview-desktop');
    const slider = new Swiper('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_D8mh9p', {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      slidesPerView: 2,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-collection-btn-next-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_D8mh9p',
        prevEl: '.featured-collection-btn-prev-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_D8mh9p'
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.featured-collection-pagination-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_D8mh9p',
        type: 'progressbar'
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: perMobile,
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: perMobileBig,
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: perDesktop,
        }
      }
    })
  }
  initFeaturedCollection();
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:select', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:deselect', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:inspector:activate', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:settings:change', initFeaturedCollection);
  }

</script>

            <div class="featured-collection-btn-next-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_R4pWVF" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Next slide" aria-controls="swiper-wrapper-43234facaa1056110" aria-disabled="false">

            </div>

    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@6.8.4/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection() {
    let item = document.querySelector('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_R4pWVF');
    let perMobile = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile');
    let perMobileBig = item.getAttribute('data-preview-mobile-big');
    let perDesktop = item.getAttribute('data-preview-desktop');
    const slider = new Swiper('.featured-collection-slider-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_R4pWVF', {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      slidesPerView: 2,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-collection-btn-next-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_R4pWVF',
        prevEl: '.featured-collection-btn-prev-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_R4pWVF'
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.featured-collection-pagination-template--23908748034207__product_sliderr_R4pWVF',
        type: 'progressbar'
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: perMobile,
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: perMobileBig,
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: perDesktop,
        }
      }
    })
  }
  initFeaturedCollection();
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:select', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:deselect', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:inspector:activate', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:settings:change', initFeaturedCollection);
  }

</script>

        <div class="tt-card-body">
            Y ES EL MYSELF by Majnoon Perfumery is a beautifully crafted scent that blends freshness and warmth with elegance. The vibrant citrusy opening, smooth floral heart, and woody base create a clean yet sophisticated fragrance perfect for daily wear. Its impressive projection and longevity make it a reliable choice for any season. Sleek, modern, and versatile—MYSLF is a confident signature scent that leaves a lasting impression.

			</svg>
			</div><div class="star-item"><svg class="trustoo-rating-icon" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
			<path d="M10 0L12.8214 6.11672L19.5106 6.90983L14.5651 11.4833L15.8779 18.0902L10 14.8L4.12215 18.0902L5.43493 11.4833L0.489435 6.90983L7.17863 6.11672L10 0Z"></path>
			</svg>
			</div><div class="star-item"><svg class="trustoo-rating-icon" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
			<path d="M10 0L12.8214 6.11672L19.5106 6.90983L14.5651 11.4833L15.8779 18.0902L10 14.8L4.12215 18.0902L5.43493 11.4833L0.489435 6.90983L7.17863 6.11672L10 0Z"></path>
			</svg>
			</div></div>
          </div>
            <div class="card-head-row2"><svg class="trustoo-badge-icon" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
			<path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 14C10.866 14 14 10.866 14 7C14 3.13401 10.866 0 7 0C3.13401 0 0 3.13401 0 7C0 10.866 3.13401 14 7 14ZM5.30236 10.7724C5.45276 10.9239 5.64913 11 5.84629 11C6.04267 11 6.23982 10.9239 6.39022 10.7724L11.775 5.32765C12.075 5.02399 12.075 4.532 11.775 4.22834C11.4742 3.92389 10.9871 3.92389 10.6871 4.22834L5.84629 9.1223L3.31288 6.56115C3.01286 6.25748 2.52581 6.25748 2.22501 6.56115C1.925 6.86481 1.925 7.35758 2.22501 7.66125L5.30236 10.7724Z" fill="#000"></path>
			</svg><span class="tt-review-verify">Verified purchase</span></div>
        </div>
        <div class="tt-card-body">
            Black Pearl unfolds with a rich and alluring warmth—a signature of haute orientals built around oud. The opening notes likely bring a velvety spice or smooth resinous swirl that instantly evokes depth and luxury.
As described by the brand this perfume likely has impressive longevity—remaining vibrant for hours, and developing into a soft, inviting base of musk, amber, and warm woods. Its projection may transition from noticeable aura to a sultry, skin-close trail—ideal for occasions that value intimacy and lasting impression.Best suited for night events &amp; formal occasions, blind buy for lovers of Oriental perfumes.
        </div>

            <div class="card-head-row2"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="tt-card-body">
            I’ve tried dozens of oud perfumes, but this one hits differently. The opening saffron is rich and smooth, and the oud isn’t harsh—it’s deep, warm, and addictive.The projection is strong but not overwhelming. Honestly didn’t expect this quality from an Indian brand—this is luxury.

			<path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 14C10.866 14 14 10.866 14 7C14 3.13401 10.866 0 7 0C3.13401 0 0 3.13401 0 7C0 10.866 3.13401 14 7 14ZM5.30236 10.7724C5.45276 10.9239 5.64913 11 5.84629 11C6.04267 11 6.23982 10.9239 6.39022 10.7724L11.775 5.32765C12.075 5.02399 12.075 4.532 11.775 4.22834C11.4742 3.92389 10.9871 3.92389 10.6871 4.22834L5.84629 9.1223L3.31288 6.56115C3.01286 6.25748 2.52581 6.25748 2.22501 6.56115C1.925 6.86481 1.925 7.35758 2.22501 7.66125L5.30236 10.7724Z" fill="#000"></path>
			</svg><span class="tt-review-verify">Verified purchase</span></div>
        </div>
        <div class="tt-card-body">
            What a performance easily 6-8 hrs 2 hrs projection bit harsh for 15 min but overall beautiful bestt for hight heat summer and humidity
        </div>
